# Scraping Data from Wikipedia
```{r}
get_election_data=function(year){
  html_str<-paste0("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_presidential_election,_",year,"#Results_by_state")
 
  
  wiki<-read_html(html_str)
  wikitables<-wiki%>%html_nodes(".wikitable.sortable")
  
  for(i in 1:length(wikitables)){
    temp=wikitables[[i]]%>%html_table(fill=TRUE)
    if(nrow(temp)>49)
      {
        result_table=temp
        break
      }
  }
  
  if(year!=1992){
    colnames(result_table)<-paste0(colnames(result_table),result_table[1,])
    result_table<-result_table[-1,]
  }else{
    colnames(result_table)<-paste0(result_table[1,],result_table[2,])
    result_table<-result_table[-(1:2),]
  }
  
 
  
  
  return(result_table)
}
# year=2016
test<-get_election_data(year)
```

```{r}
get_election_data=function(year){

  html_str<-paste0("https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/United_States_presidential_election,_",year,"#Results_by_state")
  wiki<-read_html(html_str)%>%html_nodes(".wikitable.sortable") %>% html_table(fill = T)
  
  if(length(wiki) == 1){
    wikitable = wiki[[1]]
    wikitable[1,]=str_replace_all(wikitable[1,],"^.*(?<=\\))","Margin")
    result_table =  wikitable %>%  `colnames<-`(paste0( wikitable[1,], wikitable[2,])) %>%slice(-1:-2) 
      }else if(length(wiki)==2){
    wikitable = wiki[[2]]
    result_table =  wikitable %>% `colnames<-`(paste0(colnames(wikitable),wikitable[1,])) %>% slice(-1)
    }
  return(result_table)
}


 
```
